name: Arcana Investigation Series: Episode 1
description:
This is a game in which you play as Tara Arceneaux, a detective that uses the mysterious power of the Justice Arcana to find the truth hidden in a mental cloud called the MindNet. This is a concept demo of the Arcana Investigation Series, with a dungeon, a miniboss, a boss, and a complete episode of the story. 

Features:
-See hidden secrets using the power of Field Revelation!
-NPCs react differently depending on who's talking. If you vibe with them, you might get a gift!
-Turn-based combo input battle system (Using the Justice Arcana, you can string your Justice skills together to create devastating attacks).

Controls:
'Z' or 'SPACE' to interact
'M' to swap characters
'N' to open the equip window (allows you to equip items, weapons, and skills to the toolbar)
